nobingnd.description: Non-binary gender: which option respondent says best describes them
nobingnd.question: Which option best describes your gender?

impbemw.description: Importance of being a man/woman to respondent's self-perception
impbemw.question: How important is being a man/woman to the way you think about yourself?

trmedmw.description: Unfairly treated when seeking medical treatment because of gender
trmedmw.question: Have you been unfairly treated when seeking medical treatment because you are a man/woman?

values.4: Have never visited doctor or sought medical treatment

trwrkmw.description: Unfairly treated in hiring, pay, or promotion because of gender
trwrkmw.question: Have you been unfairly treated in hiring, pay, or promotion because you are a man/woman?

values.4: Have never had a job or applied for a job

trplcmw.description: Unfairly treated by the police because of gender
trplcmw.question: Have you been unfairly treated by the police because you are a man/woman?

values.4: Have never had any contact with the police

trmdcnt.description: Perceived fairness in medical treatment based on gender in the country
trmdcnt.question: How fair is medical treatment for women and men in your country?

values.1: Women are treated less fairly than men
values.2: Men are treated less fairly than women
values.3: Women and men are treated equally fairly

trwkcnt.description: Perceived fairness in hiring, pay, or promotion based on gender in the country
trwkcnt.question: How fair is hiring, pay, or promotion for women and men in your country?

values.1: Women are treated less fairly than men
values.2: Men are treated less fairly than women
values.3: Women and men are treated equally fairly

trplcnt.description: Perceived fairness in police treatment based on gender in the country
trplcnt.question: How fair is police treatment for women and men in your country?

values.1: Women are treated less fairly than men
values.2: Men are treated less fairly than women
values.3: Women and men are treated equally fairly

eqwrkbg.description: Impact of equal participation of women and men in paid work on family life
eqwrkbg.question: How would equal participation of women and men in paid work affect family life in your country?

eqpolbg.description: Impact of equal political leadership between genders on politics
eqpolbg.question: How would equal numbers of women and men in political leadership affect politics in your country?

eqmgmbg.description: Impact of equal participation of women and men in management on businesses
eqmgmbg.question: How would equal numbers of women and men in high management positions affect businesses in your country?

eqpaybg.description: Impact of equal pay for equal work on the economy
eqpaybg.question: How would equal pay for men and women affect the economy in your country?

eqparep.description: Support for equal representation of women and men in parliament
eqparep.question: To what extent do you support dividing parliamentary seats equally between women and men?

eqparlv.description: Support for equal parental leave for both parents
eqparlv.question: To what extent do you support requiring both parents to take equal periods of paid leave for child care?

fineqpy.description: Support for fining businesses for unequal pay
fineqpy.question: To what extent do you support fining businesses that pay men more than women for the same work?

wsekpwr.description: How often women seek to gain power by getting control over men
wsekpwr.question: How often do women seek to gain power by getting control over men?

weasoff.description: How often women get easily offended
weasoff.question: How often do women get easily offended?

wlespdm.description: How often women paid less than men for same work in [country]
wlespdm.question: How often are women paid less than men for the same work in [country]?

wexashr.description: How often women exaggerate claims of sexual harassment in the workplace
wexashr.question: How often do women exaggerate claims of sexual harassment in the workplace?

wprtby.description: Women should be protected by men
wprtby.question: To what extent do you agree that women should be protected by men?

wbrgwrm.description: Women tend to have better sense of what is right and wrong compared with men
wbrgwrm.question: To what extent do you agree that women tend to have a better sense of what is right and wrong compared with men?

happy.question: Taking all things together, how happy would you say you are?

sclmeet.description: How often socially meet with friends, relatives or colleagues
sclmeet.question: Using this card, how often do you meet socially with friends, relatives or work colleagues?

inprdsc.description: How many people with whom you can discuss intimate and personal matters
inprdsc.question: How many people, if any, are there with whom you can discuss intimate and personal matters?

sclact.description: Take part in social activities compared to others of same age
sclact.question: Compared to other people of your age, how often would you say you take part in social activities?

crmvct.description: Respondent or household member victim of burglary/assault last 5 years
crmvct.question: Have you or a member of your household been the victim of a burglary or assault in the last 5 years?

aesfdrk.description: Feeling of safety of walking alone in local area after dark
aesfdrk.question: How safe do you - or would you - feel walking alone in this area after dark?

health.question: How is your health in general? Would you say it is...

hlthhmp.description: Hampered in daily activities by illness/disability/infirmity/mental problem
hlthhmp.question: Are you hampered in your daily activities in any way by any longstanding illness, or disability, infirmity or mental health problem?

ctrlife.description: How much control over life in general nowadays
ctrlife.question: How much control do you feel you have over your life in general nowadays?

etfruit.description: How often eat fruit, excluding drinking juice
etfruit.question: How often do you eat fruit, excluding drinking juice?

values.1: Three times or more a day
values.4: Less than once a day but at least 4 times a week
values.5: Less than 4 times a week but at least once a week

eatveg.description: How often eat vegetables or salad, excluding potatoes
eatveg.question: How often do you eat vegetables or salad, excluding potatoes?

values.1: Three times or more a day
values.4: Less than once a day but at least 4 times a week
values.5: Less than 4 times a week but at least once a week

dosprt.description: Do sports or other physical activity, how many of last 7 days
dosprt.question: On how many of the last 7 days did you do sports or other physical activity?

values.1: I smoke daily, 10 or more cigarettes
values.2: I smoke daily, 9 or fewer cigarettes
values.3: I smoke but not every day
values.4: I don’t smoke now but I used to
values.5: I have only smoked a few times

alcfreq.question: How often do you drink alcohol?

alcwkdy.question: How many grams of alcohol did you drink the last time you drank on a weekday (Monday to Thursday)?

values.5555: Never drink alcohol Monday to Thursday

atchctr.question: How emotionally attached do you feel to [country]? Please choose a number from 0 to 10, where 0 means not at all emotionally attached and 10 means very emotionally attached.

atcherp.question: And how emotionally attached do you feel to Europe?

likrisk.description: I like to take risks, to what extent
likrisk.question: To what extent do you like to take risks?

liklead.description: I like to be a leader, to what extent
liklead.question: To what extent do you like to be a leader?

sothnds.description: I am sensitive to others’ needs
sothnds.question: To what extent are you sensitive to others' needs?

actcomp.description: I act compassionately towards others, to what extent
actcomp.question: To what extent do you act compassionately towards others?

ipcrtiv.description: Important to think new ideas and being creative
ipcrtiv.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. Thinking up new ideas and being creative is important to her/him. She/he likes to do things in her/his own original way.

imprich.description: Important to be rich, have money and expensive things
imprich.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to be rich. She/he wants to have a lot of money and expensive things.

ipeqopt.description: Important that people are treated equally and have equal opportunities
ipeqopt.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. She/he thinks it is important that every person in the world should be treated equally. She/he believes everyone should have equal opportunities in life.

ipshabt.description: Important to show abilities and be admired
ipshabt.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It's important to her/him to show her/his abilities. She/he wants people to admire what she/he does.

impsafe.description: Important to live in secure and safe surroundings
impsafe.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to live in secure surroundings. She/he avoids anything that might endanger her/his safety.

impdiff.description: Important to try new and different things in life
impdiff.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. She/he likes surprises and is always looking for new things to do. She/he thinks it is important to do lots of different things in life.

ipfrule.description: Important to do what is told and follow rules
ipfrule.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. She/he believes that people should do what they're told. She/he thinks people should follow rules at all times, even when no-one is watching.

ipudrst.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to listen to people who are different from her/him. Even when she/he disagrees with them, she/he still wants to understand them.

ipmodst.description: Important to be humble and modest, not draw attention
ipmodst.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to be humble and modest. She/he tries not to draw attention to herself/himself.

ipgdtim.description: Important to have a good time
ipgdtim.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. Having a good time is important to her/him. She/he likes to 'spoil' herself/himself.

impfree.description: Important to make own decisions and be free
impfree.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to make her/his own decisions about what she/he does. She/he likes to be free and not depend on others.

iphlppl.description: Important to help people and care for others' well-being
iphlppl.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is very important to her/him to help the people around her/him. She/he wants to care for their well-being.

ipsuces.description: Important to be successful and that people recognise achievements
ipsuces.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. Being very successful is important to her/him. She/he hopes people will recognise her/his achievements.

ipstrgv.description: Important that government is strong and ensures safety
ipstrgv.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him that the government ensures her/his safety against all threats. She/he wants the state to be strong so it can defend its citizens.

ipadvnt.description: Important to seek adventures and have an exciting life
ipadvnt.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. She/he looks for adventures and likes to take risks. She/he wants to have an exciting life.

ipbhprp.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him always to behave properly. She/he wants to avoid doing anything people would say is wrong.

iprspot.description: Important to get respect from others
iprspot.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to get respect from others. She/he wants people to do what she/he says.

iplylfr.description: Important to be loyal to friends and devote to people close
iplylfr.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to be loyal to her/his friends. She/he wants to devote herself/himself to people close to her/him.

impenv.description: Important to care for nature and environment
impenv.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is very important to her/him to care for nature. Looking after the environment is important to her/him.

imptrad.description: Important to follow traditions and customs
imptrad.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. Tradition is important to her/him. She/he tries to follow the customs handed down by her/his religion or her/his family.

impfun.description: Important to seek fun and things that give pleasure
impfun.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. She/he seeks every chance she/he can to have fun. It is important to her/him to do things that give her/him pleasure.

uemp3m.question: Have you ever been unemployed and seeking work for a period of more than three months?

values.3: About equally by natural processes and human activity
values.55: I don't think climate change is happening

ccrdprs.description: To what extent feel personal responsibility to reduce climate change
ccrdprs.question: To what extent do you feel a personal responsibility to try to reduce climate change?

wrclmch.question: How worried are you about climate change?

testic34.description: Imagine large numbers of people limit energy use, how likely reduce climate change
testic34.question: Now imagine that large numbers of people limited their energy use. How likely do you think it is that this would reduce climate change?

testic35.description: How likely, large numbers of people limit energy use

testic36.description: How likely, governments in enough countries take action to reduce climate change
testic36.question: And how likely do you think it is that governments in enough countries will take action that reduces climate change?

values.1: Remain member of the European Union

vteubcmb.description: Would vote for [country] to become member of European Union or remain outside
vteubcmb.question: Imagine there were a referendum in [country] tomorrow about membership of the European Union. Would you vote for [country] to become a member of the European Union or to remain outside the European Union?

values.1: Become a member of the European Union
values.33: Would submit a blank ballot paper
